title: Who do I know?
text:
Since the age of eight until my 18th birthday, I competed in Color guard, marching bands, parades. My first captain was a girl named D****. I met her in 1974 and she was my captain for parades, the sabre line, and captain of color guard. She dated my eldest brother. She mentored my sister at the private school they attended. She is best friends with my first cousin.
 I congratulated her on her guard‚Äôs championship in 1980, and later she said congratulations on my championship in 1983.
I know her family and she knows mine, like family.
I requested to add her as a friend on Facebook.

You denied my request, stating that i might not know this girl.

Good Rub, Facebook

title: Worst app ever
text:

I‚Äôve extensively used Instagram Reels, not only is your menu ****, but your algorithm is **** too. I almost get no dopamine as a user attempting to find interesting posts.
